backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping radar-related feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, hooks, libraries, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style configuration defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app container managing tabs, location, weather fetching, theming, alerts, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundIllust: Component that displays and transitions weather‑themed background images with dark/light overlay gradients.
frontend/src/components/BeachMarineScree: UI screen showing marine conditions with loading, error, and empty states based on the selected location.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar switching between weather, farmer, driver, radar, and beach tabs.
frontend/src/components/DriverWeatherPan: Displays driver-focused weather risks, route analysis, and status cards with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/FarmerGardenWeat: Shows agriculture-related weather advisories such as frost, moisture, and planting, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAutocomp: Renders a floating dropdown positioned relative to an anchor element with dynamic sizing and outside-click closing.
frontend/src/components/ImminentWeatherA: Displays a dismissible banner for imminent weather alerts with severity-based styling and icons.
frontend/src/components/InitialRenderErr: Error boundary that catches initial render failures and shows a fallback UI with a reload option.
frontend/src/components/LanguageDropdown: Creates a floating language selector dropdown positioned near a trigger button with outside-click handling.
frontend/src/components/LaundryDryingRec: Presents recommended laundry drying times based on weather conditions, including best and alternative ranges.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Search input with autocomplete for selecting and clearing a SavedLocation, showing current selection and geocoding results.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarAlert: Shows an active radar alert with severity styling and a dismiss button.
UI sheet for enabling radar alerts and adjusting distance radius settings.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarEmpty: Empty-state panel prompting the user to select a location before viewing radar data.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarInfoP: Displays computed radar summary details like timing, duration, intensity, and storm direction.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarLayer: UI sheet for toggling radar overlay layers using switches and i18n labels.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarMap.t: Initializes and manages a Leaflet map, updating markers and radar/overlay layers based on location and enabled layers.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarOverl: Displays loading, error, or no‑data alerts for non‑precipitation radar overlays based on current overlay data.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarPlayb: Provides slider and playback buttons for navigating radar animation frames with i18n labels.
frontend/src/components/RadarScreen.tsx: Main radar view that handles location selection, radar data fetching, playback, overlays, and alert system UI.
frontend/src/components/RouteLocationSea: Lightweight location search for routes with autocomplete, selection display, and result handling.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Provides weather-based theme context and toggles dark mode based on theme type.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: Displays current weather, forecasts, AQI/UV info, and advisories with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeocodingSearch.ts: Performs debounced geocoding queries via Open‑Meteo and returns results with loading/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useImminentWeatherAle: Evaluates imminent weather alerts, manages dismissal persistence, and triggers Android bridge notifications with cooldowns.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarineConditions.t: Fetches marine weather data for given coordinates with periodic refetching.
Loads, stores, and clears the user’s saved location in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating query hooks are implemented elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarAlerts.ts: Manages radar alert settings, detects severe precipitation from radar frames, and handles alert dismissal.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarOverlayData.t: Fetches weather, air quality, and temperature grid data for radar overlays using Open‑Meteo APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarPlayback.ts: Controls radar animation playback, frame indexing, and helpers for labeling and identifying frames.
frontend/src/hooks/useRainViewer.ts: Fetches and caches RainViewer radar data with react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteWeatherAnalys: Interpolates route points, fetches weather for each, and runs route weather analysis.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Persists React state to sessionStorage with automatic serialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeather.ts: Fetches and transforms detailed weather and air quality data for a given location.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides locale state, persistence, and translation lookup to the app.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains Turkish and English translation strings for UI text.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Accesses the I18n context and returns translation utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines base Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for themes, dark mode, and weather‑based color variants, plus utility classes like glass surfaces.
frontend/src/lib/clothingAdvisories.ts: Generates simple clothing recommendations based on temperature, precipitation, and wind using weather thresholds.
frontend/src/lib/driverAdvisories.ts: Computes road ice and fog risk levels using temperature, humidity, precipitation, and weather codes.
frontend/src/lib/farmerAdvisories.ts: Provides multiple agriculture‑focused advisories including frost, soil moisture, precipitation, planting, and spraying analyses.
frontend/src/lib/fetchWithTimeout.ts: Implements a fetch wrapper that aborts requests after a configurable timeout.
frontend/src/lib/formatDailyForecastDate: Formats ISO dates into short weekday/month/day strings based on locale.
frontend/src/lib/imminentWeatherAlerts.t: Detects imminent severe weather within the next hour, returning alerts for storms, snow, rain, or fog.
frontend/src/lib/laundryDrying.ts: Calculates hourly drying scores and classifications using temperature, humidity, wind, and precipitation to recommend good drying periods.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteo.ts: Defines weather data interfaces and provides functions to fetch and normalize weather information from the Open-Meteo API.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteoMarine.ts: Fetches marine and forecast data, deriving wave, wind, and visibility conditions into a unified marine conditions object.
frontend/src/lib/radarNowcastSummary.ts: Computes a brief radar nowcast summary including start time, duration, intensity, and a placeholder direction.
frontend/src/lib/radarOverlays.ts: Generates visual overlay parameters for radar layers such as storms, snow, wind, temperature, and air quality.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewer.ts: Fetches RainViewer radar data and provides helpers for selecting playback frames and determining the initial frame.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewerCache.ts: Implements a sessionStorage-based cache for RainViewer data with a 5‑minute expiration.
frontend/src/lib/routeAnalysis.ts: Analyzes weather along a route to score risks like freezing, fog, precipitation, and wind, producing an overall risk assessment.
frontend/src/lib/tirePressure.ts: Calculates tire pressure adjustment recommendations based on temperature and vehicle type.
frontend/src/lib/weatherContrast.ts: Provides a helper to determine whether a weather theme should use a dark background.
frontend/src/lib/weatherTheme.ts: Maps WMO weather codes to themes, icons, and translation description keys.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/androidBridge.d.ts: Declares a global Android interface for triggering native notifications.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related builds, enabling ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, path aliasing, a dev server proxy, and build settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, feature requirements, and the goal of showing future nowcast radar imagery.
